displayName: Ensure that 'Auditing' Retention is 'greater than 90 days'
rationale: Audit Logs can be used to check for anomalies and give insight into suspected breaches or misuse of information and access.
recommended_action:
1. Go to SQL servers
2. For this server instance
3. Click on Auditing
4. Select Storage Details
5. Set Retention (days) setting greater than 90 days
6. Select OK
7. Select Save
error_message: SQL server does not have auditing enabled
ruleNames: Ensure that log rentention length satisfies requirements
